data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Poupin, Joseph, Crestey, Nicole, Guelte, Jean-Paul Le (2018): Cave-dwelling crabs of the genus Karstarma from lava tubes of the volcano ‘ Piton de la Fournaise’, in Réunion Island, with description of a new species and redescription of Karstarma jacksoni (Balss, 1934) from Christmas Island (Decapoda, Brachyura, Sesarmidae). Zootaxa 4497 (3): 381-397, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4497.3.3|6 occurrences
